snippet.title: Ghost Detective | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
You’re a detective who’s been killed on the job. Now as a ghost, your mission is clear: Find hidden objects and solve puzzles to catch your own murderer.

Play Ghost Detective on your mobile devices. Available exclusively on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/game/81680595

SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/29qBUt7

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services with over 238 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Ghost Detective | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix
